h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Find the Venom Daoist for the Second Time
content: Here, you'll want to take a left and go across the water and up the stairs. Once you've taken the next set of stairs up, you'll come to a path with another tree at the end of it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_4_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Venom Daoist for the Second Time'.
The content is as follows:
Here, you'll want to take a left and go across the water and up the stairs. Once you've taken the next set of stairs up, you'll come to a path with another tree at the end of it.
